thread.title: Shannon
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Shannon

author: Shannon
title: Shannon
text: I hate high pressure sale. Hate it. Home Zone is the complete opposite of that. We got to work with Norma. She encouraged us to take our time, to mix and match dining room pieces, which we did. She gave us tips on certain sets and was super helpful. I would highly recommend buying furniture at Home Zone. It was the best experience. No pressure. Great environment. Friendly staff. Will definitely go back.
